Title: College Radio Memories
Description: For those who spent their university days hanging around the campus radio station during the heyday of college radio. Journey back to the '80s and early '90s when all the best music could be found to the left of the dial.
Artists on this station: The Cure, Husker Du, Talking Heads, Pixies, The Smiths, Morrissey, Sonic Youth, Cocteau Twins, Elvis Costello, The Replacements, Aztec Camera, R.E.M., The The, Squeeze, Billy Bragg, The La's,
Similar stations: Manic Madchester, Post-Punk Pleasures, Sophisticated '80s, The World of R.E.M., All-Night Goth Pop, New Wave Dance Party, Dark Side of the Synth, Goths Just Wanna Have Fun, Your Own John Hughes Movie, Punk Songs of Defiance, Cool Like Debbie Harry, Gothstalgia: The Dark Side of the '90s , James Murphy's Record Collection, The Goth Parade, Crying On My Keyboards, Indie for an Indian Summer,
